) Vendor.getInitialProps = async function() { const res = await fetch('https://api.tvmaze.com/search/shows?q=batman'); const data = await res.json(); console.log(`Show data fetched. Count: ${data.length}`); return { shows: data.map(entry => entry.show) }; }; const styles = { row: { margin: '2%', padding: '0px' }, col: { padding: '0px', margin: '0px' }, card: { background: 'white', borderRadius: '0px', padding: '0px' }, card_header: { background: 'white', color: 'gray', border: 'none' }, card_text: { color: '#6A7074', fontSize: '30px', }, fontawesome: { color: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, width: '50px', height: '50px', maxHeight: '50px', maxWidth: '50px', float: 'right' }, } export default Vendor;
